warmupNames.name: Neck Circles
warmupNames.desc: Rotate your neck in large circles.

warmupNames.name: Arm Circles Forward
warmupNames.desc: Swing arms in large forward circles.

warmupNames.name: Arm Circles Backward
warmupNames.desc: Swing arms in large backward circles.

warmupNames.name: Shoulder Shrugs
warmupNames.desc: Lift shoulders up towards ears, then drop.

warmupNames.name: Torso Twists
warmupNames.desc: Twist upper body side to side with arms extended.

warmupNames.name: Hip Circles
warmupNames.desc: Rotate hips in large circles.

warmupNames.name: Knee Hugs
warmupNames.desc: Pull one knee to chest, then switch.

warmupNames.name: Ankle Rotations
warmupNames.desc: Rotate ankles in circles.

warmupNames.name: Jumping Jacks (Slow)
warmupNames.desc: Perform jumping jacks slowly.

warmupNames.name: High Knees (Slow)
warmupNames.desc: March with high knees slowly.

warmupNames.name: Butt Kicks
warmupNames.desc: Kick heels to glutes while marching.

warmupNames.name: Side Lunges
warmupNames.desc: Step to side into lunge, alternate.

warmupNames.name: Forward Lunges
warmupNames.desc: Step forward into lunge, alternate.

warmupNames.name: Calf Raises
warmupNames.desc: Stand tall. Lift heels off ground as high as possible. Lower slowly.

warmupNames.name: Wall Sits (Short)
warmupNames.desc: Lean back against wall. Slide down until thighs are parallel to floor. Hold briefly.

warmupNames.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
warmupNames.desc: On hands and knees, alternate arching and rounding back.

warmupNames.name: Downward Dog
warmupNames.desc: Push hips up and back from plank, forming inverted V.

warmupNames.name: Child's Pose
warmupNames.desc: Kneel and fold forward, arms extended.

warmupNames.name: Arm Cross Stretch
warmupNames.desc: Cross one arm over body, hold with other.

warmupNames.name: Tricep Stretch
warmupNames.desc: Reach one arm overhead, bend elbow, pull with other hand.

warmupNames.name: Wrist Rotations
warmupNames.desc: Rotate wrists in circles.

warmupNames.name: Leg Swings
warmupNames.desc: Swing one leg forward and back, then side to side.

rawExercises.desc: Lie on back, knees bent. Hands behind head. Lift only shoulders off floor using abs. Lower slowly.
Lie on back, knees bent, feet anchored. Lift entire torso up to knees. Lower back down with control.
Lie on back. Hands behind head. Touch elbow to opposite knee while extending other leg. Alternate.
Rest on forearms and toes. Keep body in a straight line from head to heels. Squeeze glutes and abs. Don't let hips sag.
Lie on side, weight on forearm. Lift hips to form straight line. Hold.
Lie on side, weight on forearm. Lift hips to form straight line. Hold.
Lie on back, hands under glutes. Lift legs straight up to 90 degrees. Lower slowly without touching floor.
Lie on back, legs straight. Lift heels slightly. Kick legs up and down in small, rapid motions.
Sit, lean back slightly, feet off floor. Twist torso touching floor on left, then right side.
Plank position. Quickly drive one knee to chest, then switch legs explosively, like running horizontally.
Lie on back. Lift legs and torso simultaneously to touch toes, forming a V shape.
Lie on back, legs straight up. Reach hands to touch toes, lifting shoulders off floor.
Lie on back, arms and legs in air. Lower opposite arm and leg towards floor. Return to center. Switch.
Lie on back. Lift shoulders and legs slightly off floor. Press lower back into ground. Hold.
On hands and knees. Extend opposite arm and leg straight out. Hold. Return. Switch sides.
Lie on back, knees bent. Pull knees towards chest using abs. Lower back down slowly.
Lie on back in hollow position. Rock back and forth using core strength.
In plank position. Dip hips side to side while maintaining straight body line.
Lie on back, knees bent. Alternate touching heels with hands.
Sit with knees bent, lean back. Tuck knees to chest using abs.
Plank position, hands under shoulders. Lower chest to floor keeping body straight. Push back up fully.
Plank with wide hand placement. Lower chest to floor. Push back up.
Plank with hands close forming diamond. Lower chest to hands. Push up.
Hands on elevated surface, body angled. Lower chest to surface. Push up.
Feet elevated, hands on floor. Lower chest to floor. Push up.
Downward dog position. Lower head to floor by bending elbows. Push up.
Sit on floor or chair edge, hands behind. Lift hips. Bend elbows to lower body, then push back up.
Plank position. Alternate tapping shoulders with opposite hand.
Push-up position. Bring knee to elbow as lowering. Alternate sides.
Plank on forearms. Push up to full plank, then back down.
Stand. Hinge at hips to touch floor. Walk hands out to plank. Walk hands back to feet. Stand up.
Start in downward dog. Dive forward to upward dog, then back.
Wide push-up. Shift weight to one side, extending arm out.
Push-up with shoulders forward over hands. Lower and push up.
Start in downward dog. Dive chest to floor, then push up through upward dog.
Push-up, then rotate to side plank, arm extended. Alternate sides.
Stand facing wall, hands on wall. Bend elbows to bring chest to wall. Push back.
Push-ups from knees.
One arm wall push-up.
Push-up with clap at top.
Sit on floor, hands behind. Lift hips, dip.
Lie on stomach, arms extended forward. Lift arms and legs off floor simultaneously. Hold, then lower.
Lie on stomach, arms at sides. Slide arms overhead then back down.
Lie on stomach. Lift arms to form Y shape. Lower slowly.
Plank position. Protract and retract shoulder blades without bending elbows.
Lie on stomach. Raise arms in I, Y, T shapes. Lower slowly.
Sit with hands behind, lift hips. Reach one arm overhead. Alternate.
On hands and knees, hold.
Stand feet shoulder-width. Lower hips back and down like sitting in a chair, keeping chest up. Drive through heels to stand.
Wide stance, toes out. Lower hips down, keeping chest up. Stand up.
Squat down, then jump up explosively. Land softly.
Step one leg forward. Lower hips until both knees are 90 degrees. Back knee hovers off floor. Push off front foot to return.
Step one leg backward. Lower hips until both knees 90 degrees. Push off back foot to return.
Step one leg to side. Lower hips, keeping other leg straight. Push off side foot to return.
Step one leg behind and across. Lower hips. Return to start.
Stand tall. Lift heels off ground as high as possible. Lower slowly.
Lean back against wall. Slide down until thighs are parallel to floor. Hold.
Lie on back, knees bent. Lift hips toward ceiling until body is straight line. Squeeze glutes.
Glute bridge with one leg extended. Lift hips using single leg.
On hands and knees. Kick one leg back and up. Alternate.
On hands and knees. Lift one leg out to side. Lower. Alternate.
Stand on one leg. Lower into squat using assistance if needed.
Step onto imaginary bench with one foot. Drive up with that leg. Step down.
Wide stance. Squat to one side, keeping other leg straight. Alternate.
Lie on back, knees out. Lift hips using glutes. Lower.
Lunge position. Hold without moving.
Squat and walk forward with small steps.
Stand on one leg. Hinge at hips, reach opposite hand to floor. Stand up.
Squat with hands behind head. Lower and stand.
From kneeling, stand to squat position. Repeat.
Perform small, partial repetitions at the hardest part of the squat.
Perform small pulses at the bottom of the lunge.
Get into squat position and maintain it.
Wide stance squat with pulses.
Squat, then step into lunge.
Lunge walking forward.
Hinge at hips, reach down.
Start standing. Jump feet wide while clapping hands overhead. Jump feet back together while lowering arms.
Stand. Drop to squat. Kick feet back to plank. Drop chest to floor. Jump feet in. Jump up high.
Run in place, driving knees up towards chest as high as possible. Pump arms.
Run in place, kicking heels to glutes.
Leap laterally to the right, landing on right foot, left leg behind. Leap to left. Swing arms.
Pretend to jump rope, swinging arms and jumping.
Squat, jump up spreading arms and legs into star shape. Land in squat.
Jump up, tuck knees to chest. Land softly.
On hands and toes, knees hovering off floor. Crawl forward moving opposite arm and leg.
Sit with hands behind, lift hips. Walk backward using hands and feet.
Jump onto imaginary box, then step down.
Like jumping jacks but clap hands under legs.
Squat with hands on floor. Jump forward, landing in squat.
Lunge position. Hop up switching legs in air.
Run in place with quick feet.
Hop side to side over imaginary line.
Jump into split position, switching legs.
Plank position. Jump feet out wide then back together.
Squat, kick feet back to plank, jump feet in.
Bear crawl position. Kick one leg through to other side.
Run with high knees, bringing knee across body.
Squat, jump forward as far as possible. Land in squat.
Burpee without the jump at the end.
Lie on side. Lift top leg up and down.
Lie on back, knees out. Lift hips using inner thighs.
Lie on back, knees bent. Alternate touching heels.
Crunch bringing elbow to opposite knee.
Plank, rotate hips to side, extending arm up.
Plank, bring knee to opposite elbow.
Lie on back. Cross legs like scissors.
Lie on back, legs up. Rotate legs side to side.
Side plank. Dip hips down and up.
Cobra pose, push hips back.
Plank with forearms on elevation.
Plank with feet elevated.
Plank on one leg.
Sit with hands behind, lift hips.
On hands and knees, hold.
